entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a person who has done something to distract Filch from Harry. He is described as having 'wrecked something very big this time'.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who is being distracted by Peeves. He is the one in charge of discipline at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is trying to avoid Filch's attention.

entities.name: kwikspell
entities.description: Kwikspell is a correspondence course in beginners' magic that Harry finds intriguing.

entities.name: harry's form
entities.description: Harry has a half-completed form on his desk.

relationships.description: Peeves' actions distract Filch from Harry.
Harry is intrigued by the Kwikspell course and reads its contents.
